meanings.definition: A brief summary or general survey of something.
meanings.sent1: I read the synopsis of the book to get an idea of what it was about.
meanings.sent2: The movie website provided a synopsis of the film's plot.
meanings.sent3: The synopsis of the play was so short, it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a synopsis of adventures and misadventures.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's synopsis of the lesson made it easy to remember.

meanings.sent1: The synopsis at the beginning of the report gave a quick overview.
meanings.sent2: The synopsis of the meeting highlighted the key points discussed.
meanings.sent3: His synopsis of the movie was so brief, it sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: The synopsis of the plan was like a roadmap to success.
meanings.sent5: The synopsis of the story was like a sneak peek into a magical world.
